Home » Post your write-ups, reviews, film and media info

Post your write-ups, reviews, film and media info

Attention Freshers, reporters, writers, journalist, film, camera enthusiasts and all blog posters on networking sites . Here's the most unique opportunity.

 

Join films is the leading web portal for information on authentic film news, true facts and film reviews along with interesting cover stories on film making, shooting locations, media auditions, events and gamut of technical and non-technical information related to media vocations. Films are shot in every corner of the world and celebrities visit every place on the face of earth. Again we appreciate your writing skills and your knowledge about the true facts and events of the media industry in your region, town, city or state. We are confident that you achieve this by putting additional efforts and research in information gathering to generate factual stories, first hand media and trade news with both images and videos.

 

So here you have a unique opportunity that is easily accessible to showcase all your well researched stories, columns, film news, artist news, film reviews, event news that can be uploaded in news and article section while visuals in the form of images or videos that can be uploaded on Image Gallery and Showcase segments of Join films portal. Mostly you do this work of expressing opinion, writing story or review, sharing images and videos for free on many social networking sites. The best part is that you will be paid for sharing the same information on www.joinfilms.com 

 

Again the benefit is that you can also be given direct access to post write-ups or images on the website if you provide consistent quality postings. We are also excellent in promoting all our web content on internet ensuring that your unique story reaches to audience worldwide. Rest assured you have a chance to become both a paid and famous celebrated media writer or reporter by sending the authentic media information to us.

 

Use of the Site: Anyone can share their articles, reviews, tips, media job info, projects or other related material on the site. You are allowed to use the site at your own risk. 

 

Cash Credit and rate: Only self written, well formatted resources are eligible for cash credits. The rate given is per 100 words 1 credit point and one credit point is equivalent to Rs 10. 

 

Any content posted by the member will continue to be in the name of the author however they cannot remove the content once reviewed and published on the site. 

 

Cash Reward and Points System: Join films may announce prizes without any prior notification. Winners of prizes are selected based on the article/code contents, usefulness, downloads, readers feedback, judge’s decision and other factors.

 

Further information to reinforce our commitment is contained in the company’s web portal  www.joinfilms.com which we now invite you to peruse with pleasure. Click on the following link to check the news posting section http://www.joinfilms.com/news

 

(The Detailed Statement of Terms and Conditions for writers with Statement of Rights and Responsibilities is mentioned on the website as both will be applicable to the writer’s, please go through it carefully).
